targets.expr: max(clamp_min(time() - max by (source)(peaktrade_ai_last_event_timestamp_seconds_by_run_id{run_id=~"$run_id"}), 0)) or on() vector(0)

clamp_min(((sum(increase(peaktrade_ai_decisions_total{decision="reject",run_id=~"$run_id"}[5m])) or on() vector(0)) / clamp_min((sum(increase(peaktrade_ai_decisions_total{run_id=~"$run_id"}[5m])) or on() vector(0)), 1e-9)), 0)
max(clamp_min(time() - max by (source) (peaktrade_ai_last_event_timestamp_seconds_by_run_id{run_id=~"$run_id"}), 0)) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: AI Live — UX v2 (reasons, actions, SLO, timeline)

targets.expr: topk(6, sum by (action) (increase(peaktrade_ai_actions_total{run_id=~"$run_id"}[5m]))) OR on(action) label_replace(vector(0), "action", "none", "", "")
topk(6, sum by (reason) (increase(peaktrade_ai_decisions_total{decision="reject",run_id=~"$run_id"}[5m]))) OR on(reason) label_replace(vector(0), "reason", "none", "", "")
topk(6, sum by (reason) (increase(peaktrade_ai_decisions_total{decision="noop",run_id=~"$run_id"}[5m]))) OR on(reason) label_replace(vector(0), "reason", "none", "", "")

panels.title: AI Activity State (per decision type, last 30m)

targets.expr: topk(8, sum by (reason) (increase(peaktrade_ai_decisions_total{decision="reject",run_id=~"$run_id"}[10m]))) OR on(reason) label_replace(vector(0), "reason", "none", "", "")

panels.title: Shadow pipeline signals (throughput, errors, latency, risk blocks)
Replay/compare signals (Execution Watch API metrics, if enabled)
